subject: Maven,spring3,aspectj and junit can now run parallel tests
msgSnippet: A full set of patches that allows parallel running of tests in maven/spring3/junit environment has been released. This blogpost
messageBody:
A full set of patches that allows parallel running of tests in maven/spring3/junit environment has been released.

This blogpost (http://incodewetrustinc.blogspot.com/) in question outlines the steps needed for parallel running, and the expected benefits.

The patches have been submitted to the projects in question, but as of today, they do not exist in any release. The full set of patches has been run on a "production builf system" in a highly concurrent 2-chip 8 core xeon server for a total of 7 days flat out without any concurrency related issues, a total of nearly 7000 builds have been run.

I will be maintaining this patch-set until the respective projects hopefully accept the patches. (Spring, aspectj, junit and maven-surefire)

Kristian Rosenvold, http://twitter.com/krosenvold for further updates
